array.string: skills#grasps object in palm
play with sponges in the tub
provide input to palm with massage and lotion
skills#transferring toys
stick puffs to baby's hand to see if he'll grab them with opposite hand
skills#picks up objects using raking motion with fingers
place multiple small objects such as puffs or cheerios on tray so baby will attempt to grab more than one
skills#reaching with one arm
present small desired toy or food item that baby can grasp with one hand while baby is holding a toy in the other hand
place teething ring on baby's toes
skills#banging objects
seat baby in high chair with large spoon or rattle that baby can bang on tray
skills#holds small objects between index/middle fingers and thumb (radial palmar)
place a small block inside a box so baby will attempt to reach in and grab with one hand
skills#voluntarily releases objects
roll a ball back and forth together
let baby play in grass and sand
skills#points / pokes with index finger
explore holes of peg board, push buttons on toys
skills#turn pages of book
use board books
skills#grabs small objects with thumb and side of index finger (inferior pincer)
place finger food in bowl or container to encourage baby to pick up with thumb and index fingers
skills#pincer grasp (index finger and thumb)
finger foods (puffs or Cheerios, cooked pasta, peas)
pulling tissues from a box
place puffs in ice cube tray
